short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Centrally distributed randomization for Curvefever inventory

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: After about half a year of experience in Curve Fever @SzNagyMisu found that there are powerUps that we rarely or never use. Also there are some who have grown so expert in using a couple of powerUps that it seemed only fair to ask for a randomized game. Something like ARAM in League of Legends. This extension pulls the random suggestions from a server and highlights them.
